reviewText: This is a 30 minute infomercial. It plays scenes from other Playboy titles. The disc I received was scratched and covered in grimy prints. It was obviously not new as advertised. Don't waste your money.

This looks very much like a freebie sent out to people who bought subscriptions (it comes in a paper cover instead of a jewel box, and it consists of repeats from other videos already published). Having said that, it wasn't too bad. The T and A is there, as well as some pink. It also avoids the unfortunate tendency Playboy has of asking these girls to actually speak, as if anyone actually wanted to hear what they have to say. Pretty girls with their knickers down, short and sweet.
